report.title: Species counts league for event by linked site
report.description: An event (date and survey) filtered league table of taxon counts by location. Requires sites to be linked to records by location_id.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations l LEFT JOIN (cache_occurrences_functional o #agreements_join# ) ON o.location_id=l.id AND o.record_status<>'R' #filters# AND #sharing_filter# #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND (l.code NOT LIKE ('%+%') OR l.code IS NULL) GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.
